title: At the Watering Hole
description: During the dry season on the African savanna, the watering hole is a gathering place for many animals. The book At the Watering Hole allows students to learn about the variety of animals that come to get a drink at this special place. The book can also be used to teach students to classify information and the proper use of verbs.
reviewWords: drink, flock, pack, parade, savanna, watering hole
awareness: Short Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate short vowel /o/ sound
phonics: Short Vowels                : Identify short vowel o
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word come
